channel.title: Save Files on ZooBerry
channel.description: Recent content in Save Files on ZooBerry

item.title: African Jeep Safari Save File
item.description: This is a Jeep Safari Tour of various African animals.

item.title: Alpine Wildlife Preserve Save File
item.description: A wildlife preserve where sick or injured alpine animals are cared for.

item.title: Animal Kingdom Wildlife Park Save File
item.description: A wildlife preserve where sick or injured alpine animals are cared for.

item.title: Arctic Wildlife Preserve Save File
item.description: A wildlife preserve where sick or injured tundra animals are cared for. You must download the official musk ox for this zoo.

item.title: Avian Area Save File
item.description: The Avian Area is a zoo dedicated to birds. The founders wanted to build a home for our feathered friends.

item.title: Cat Sanctuary Save File
item.description: A zoo filled with cats!

item.title: Catotopia Zoo Save File
item.description: Small Tropical Rainforest zoo with six of Zoo Tycoon Cats.

item.title: Celebration Zoo Save File
item.description: Its a five star zoo for almost year and a half… has every animal except black leopard… hope you like it!

item.title: City Zoo Save File
item.description: This is my first official ZT2 Zoo. It has a polar bear exhibit, Red Panda & Giant Panda Exhibit, and more. There are three Guest Mode Screenshots and one screenshot.

item.title: Concrete Jungle Save File
item.description: This is the latest City Zoo from my show and tell. All the exhibits are complete with food, enrichment and shelters.

item.title: Deep Forest Ruins Zoo Save File
item.description: This zoo is my present for the 5th anniversary of ZA. Look and enjoy the spectacular antiques ruins on beautiful deep tropical forest with their animals (from Africa, Asia and S. America). from Arecibo, Puerto Rico. Work with AA and ES.

item.title: Dulliken Zoo Save File
item.description: A small boreal zoo located in the heart of Switzerland.

item.title: Emerald Grove Save File
item.description: This zoo is made on a large city map and has spacious exhibits and room for all the latest animal downloads. All the exhibits have shelters, food and enrichment. I have included a food court and five restaurants.

item.title: Endangered Species Breeding Compound Save File
item.description: This zoo was built to breed endangered animals from Africa and Asia.

item.title: Flamingo Frenzy Zoo Save File
item.description: This is a 2 and a half star zoo that contains 6 different kinds of flamingos, one being the greater flamingo.

item.title: Icy Mountain Zoo Save File
item.description: Icy Mountain Zoo is a medium map zoo set in a Tundra location with the following animals: Musk Ox, Snow Leopard, Kodiak Bear, Emperor Penguin, and Polar Bear.

item.title: Kiwah's YAFI Zoo Save File
item.description: This is a fun Yafi zoo with 22 exhibits. It needs the Endangered Species Expansion Pack.

item.title: Komodo Falls Zoo Save File
item.description: This is a 5 star zoo that has 3 waterfalls (2 huge ones) and many rare animals including the Giant Panda, Florida Panther, and the Ethiopian Wolf. There is also a sky tram. You need the AA and ES expansions for this zoo to work. I hope you enjoy the Komodo Falls Zoo!

item.title: Laguna Zoo Save File
item.description: This zoo requires all of the user downloads.

item.title: Monkey Paradise Park Save File
item.description: Includes all 3 primates and is set in the rainforest near a lake.

item.title: Lavender Fields Save File
item.description: Lavender Fields is a map for Zoo Tycoon 2 created by Wiene.

item.title: Paranoia Graveyard
item.description: Paranoia Graveyard is a map for Zoo Tycoon 2 created by PrimevalRaptor.

item.title: Temperate Bridges Save File
item.description: Temperate Bridges is a map for Zoo Tycoon 2 created by ceej12.

item.title: Zoo Irvine Save File
item.description: This zoo has 7 different sections.
